GR14hbhvil_u:11864: śauca-kāleṣu sarveṣu guruṣv alpeṣu vā punaḥ |
GR14hbhvil_u:11865: na vilambeta śaucārthaṃ na mukhenānalaṃ dhamet // Hbhv_11.730 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11867: ajāśvau muhato medhyau na gor vatsasya cānanam // Hbhv_11.731 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11870: spṛṣṭvā snāyīta śaucārthaṃ tathaiva mṛta-hāriṇaḥ // Hbhv_11.732 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11871: nāraṃ spṛṣṭvāsthi sa-snehaṃ snātaḥ śudhyati mānavaḥ |
GR14hbhvil_u:11872: ācamyaiva tu nisnehaṃ gām ālabhyārkam īkṣya vā // Hbhv_11.733 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11873: na cālapej janaṃ dviṣṭaṃ vīra-hīnāṃ tathā striyam |
GR14hbhvil_u:11879: etad eva hi kartavyaṃ prājñaiḥ śodhanam ātmanaḥ // Hbhv_11.736 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11881: yac cāpi kurvato nātmā jugupsām eti putraka |
GR14hbhvil_u:11882: tat kartavyam aśaṅkena yan na gopyaṃ mahājane // Hbhv_11.737 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11884: upāsate na ye pūrvāṃ dvijāḥ sandhyāṃ na paścimām |
GR14hbhvil_u:11885: sarvāms tān dhārmiko rājā śūdra-karmaṇi yojayet // Hbhv_11.738 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11887: ucchiṣṭotsarjanaṃ bhūpa sadā kāryā hitaiṣiṇā // Hbhv_11.739 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11888: ucchiṣṭau na spṛśec chīrṣaṃ sarve prāṇās tad-āśrayāḥ |
GR14hbhvil_u:11889: keśa-grāhān prahārāṃś ca śirasy etāni varjayet |
GR14hbhvil_u:11890: na pāṇibhyām ubhābhyāṃ tu kaṇḍūyāj jātu vai śiraḥ // Hbhv_11.740 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11892: suvāsinīr gurviṇīś ca vṛddhaṃ bālāturau tathā |
GR14hbhvil_u:11893: bhojayet saṃskṛtānn eva prathamaṃ caramaṃ gṛhī // Hbhv_11.741 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11894: aghaṃ sa kevalaṃ bhuṅkte vṛddhe go-vāhanādike |
GR14hbhvil_u:11895: yo bhuṅkte pāṇḍava-śreṣṭha prekṣatām apradāya ca // Hbhv_11.742 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11896: varjayed dadhi-śaktuṃ ca rātrau dhānāś ca vāsare // Hbhv_11.743 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11898: srajaś ca nāvakarṣeta na bahir dhārayeta ca |
GR14hbhvil_u:11899: gṛhe pārāvatā dhanyāḥ śukāś ca saha-sārikāḥ // Hbhv_11.744 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11901: tṛṇaṃ vā yadi vā śākaṃ mūlaṃ vā jalam eva vā |
GR14hbhvil_u:11903: na rājñaḥ pratigṛhṇīyān na śūdrāt patitād api |
GR14hbhvil_u:11904: nānyasmād yācakatvaṃ ca ninditād varjayed budhaḥ // Hbhv_11.746 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11905: nityaṃ yācanako na syāt punas tatraiva yācayet |
GR14hbhvil_u:11906: prāṇān apaharaty eṣa yācakas tasya durmatiḥ // Hbhv_11.747 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11908: brahmasvaṃ ca nāpahared āpady api kadācana // Hbhv_11.748 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11909: na viṣaṃ viṣam ity āhur brahmasvaṃ viṣam ucyate |
GR14hbhvil_u:11910: devasvaṃ vāpi yatnena sadā pariharet tataḥ // Hbhv_11.749 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11911: na dharmasyāpadeśena pāpaṃ kṛtvā vrataṃ caret |
GR14hbhvil_u:11913: pretyeha cedṛśo vipro garhyeta brahma-vādibhiḥ // Hbhv_11.750 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11918: muktvā samudrayor deśaṃ nānyatra nivased dvijaḥ // Hbhv_11.752 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11919: kṛṣṇo vā yatra carati mṛgo nityaṃ svabhāvataḥ |
GR14hbhvil_u:11920: puṇyāś ca viśrutā nadyas tatra vā nivased dvijaḥ |
GR14hbhvil_u:11925: para-kṣetre carantīṃ gāṃ na cācakṣīta kasyacit // Hbhv_11.754 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11927: parasmai kathayed vidvān śaśinaṃ vā kathaṃcana |
GR14hbhvil_u:11928: tithiṃ pakṣasya na brūyān nakṣatrāṇi vinirdiśet // Hbhv_11.755 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11930: nindayed yo gurūn devān vedaṃ vā sopabṛṃhitam |
GR14hbhvil_u:11931: kalpa-koṭi-śataṃ sāgraṃ raurave pacyate naraḥ // Hbhv_11.756 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11932: tūṣṇīm āsīta nindāyāṃ na brūyāt kiṃcid uttaram |
GR14hbhvil_u:11933: karṇau pidhāya gantavyaṃ na cainam avalokayet // Hbhv_11.757 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11934: varjayed rahasyaṃ ca pareṣāṃ gūhayed budhaḥ |
GR14hbhvil_u:11935: vivādaṃ svajanaiḥ sārdhaṃ na kuryād vai kadācana // Hbhv_11.758 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11936: na pāpaṃ pāpinaṃ brūyād apāpaṃ vā dvijottamāḥ // Hbhv_11.759 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11937: nekṣetodyantam ādityaṃ śaśinaṃ vā nimittataḥ // Hbhv_11.760 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11938: āstaṃ yāntaṃ na vāristhaṃ nopasṛṣṭaṃ na madhyagam |
GR14hbhvil_u:11939: tirohitaṃ vāsasā vā na darśāntara-gāminam // Hbhv_11.761 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11940: nagnāṃ striyaṃ pumāṃsaṃ vā purīṣaṃ mūtram eva vā |
GR14hbhvil_u:11942: na mukta-bandhanāṃ gāṃ vā nonmattaṃ mattam eva vā |
GR14hbhvil_u:11943: spṛśen na bhojane patnīṃ nainām īkṣeta mehatīm // Hbhv_11.763 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11944: kṣubantīṃ jṛmbhamāṇāṃ vā nāsanasthāṃ yathā sukham |
GR14hbhvil_u:11945: nodake cātmano rūpaṃ nakulaṃ śvabhram eva vā // Hbhv_11.764 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11946: na śūdrāya matiṃ dadyāt kṛṣaraṃ pāyasaṃ dadhi |
GR14hbhvil_u:11947: nocchiṣṭaṃ vā ghṛta-madhu na ca kṛṣṇājinaṃ haviḥ // Hbhv_11.765 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11948: na kuryāt kasyacit pīḍāṃ sutaṃ śiṣyaṃ ca tāḍayet |
GR14hbhvil_u:11950: na ca śiṣyānnaṃ satkuryān nātmānaṃ śaṃsayed budhaḥ // Hbhv_11.766 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11951: na nadīṃ ca nadīṃ brūyāt parvateṣu na parvatam |
GR14hbhvil_u:11952: āvaset tena naivāpi yas tyajet sahavāsinam // Hbhv_11.767 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11954: romāṇi ca rahasyāni svāni khāni na ca spṛśet // Hbhv_11.768 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11956: nābhihanyāj jalaṃ padbhyāṃ pāṇinā na kadācana // Hbhv_11.769 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11957: na ghātayed iṣṭakābhiḥ phalāni na phalena ca |
GR14hbhvil_u:11958: na mleccha-bhāṣaṇaṃ śikṣen na karṣec ca padāsanam // Hbhv_11.770 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11959: notsaṅge bhakṣayed bhakṣyān gāṃ ca saṃveśayen na hi |
GR14hbhvil_u:11960: nākṣaiḥ krīḍen na dhāveta strībhir vādaṃ ca cācaret // Hbhv_11.771 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11961: na dantair nakha-lomāni chindyāt suptaṃ na bodhayet |
GR14hbhvil_u:11962: na bālātapam āsevet preta-dhūmaṃ vivarjayet // Hbhv_11.772 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11963: naikaḥ supyāt śūnya-gṛhe svayaṃ nopānahau haret |
GR14hbhvil_u:11964: nākāraṇād vā niṣṭhīven na bāhubhyāṃ nadīṃ taret // Hbhv_11.773 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11966: nāgnau pratāpayet pādau na kāṃsye dhārayed budhaḥ // Hbhv_11.774 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11967: nābhipratārayed devān brāhmaṇān gām athāpi vā |
GR14hbhvil_u:11969: na caivānnaṃ padā vāpi na deva-pratimāṃ spṛśet // Hbhv_11.775 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11971: caityaṃ bṛhmaṃ naiva chindyān nāpsu ṣṭhīvanam utsṛjet |
GR14hbhvil_u:11972: na cāgniṃ laṅghayed dhīmān nopadadhyād adhaḥ kvacit // Hbhv_11.776 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11973: na cainaṃ pādataḥ kuryāt tila-baddhaṃ niśi tyajet |
GR14hbhvil_u:11974: na kūpam avaroheta nācakṣītāśuciḥ kvacit // Hbhv_11.777 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11975: agnau na prakṣiped agniṃ nādbhiḥ praśamayet tathā |
GR14hbhvil_u:11976: suhṛn-maraṇam ārtiṃ vā na svayaṃ śrāvayet parān |
GR14hbhvil_u:11977: apaṇyam atha paṇyaṃ vā vikrayaṃ na prayojayet // Hbhv_11.778 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11978: puṇya-sthānodaka-sthāne sīmāntaṃ vā kṛṣen na tu |
GR14hbhvil_u:11980: parasparaṃ paśūn vyālān pakṣiṇo na ca yodhayet |
GR14hbhvil_u:11981: kārayitvā sva-karmāṇi kārūn vidvān na vañcayet // Hbhv_11.780 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11982: bahir gandhaṃ ca kudvāra-praveśaṃ ca vivarjayet |
GR14hbhvil_u:11983: naikaś caret sabhāṃ vipraḥ samavāyaṃ ca varjayet // Hbhv_11.781 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11984: na vījayed vā vastreṇa na devāyatane svapet |
GR14hbhvil_u:11986: nākrāmet kāmataś chāyāṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ gavām api |
GR14hbhvil_u:11987: svāntu nākrāmayec chāyaṃ patitādyair na rogibhiḥ // Hbhv_11.783 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11988: nāśnīyāt payasā takraṃ na bījāny upabījayet |
GR14hbhvil_u:11989: vivatsāyāś ca goḥ kṣīram auṣṭraṃ vā nirdaśasya ca |
GR14hbhvil_u:11990: āvikaṃ sandhinī-kṣīram apeyaṃ manur abravīt // Hbhv_11.784 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11991: hanta-kāram athāgryaṃ vā bhikṣāṃ vā śaktito dvijaḥ |
GR14hbhvil_u:11992: dadyād atithaye nityaṃ budhyeta parameśvaram // Hbhv_11.785 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11993: bhikṣām āhur grāsa-mātram agryaṃ tasmāc caturguṇam |
GR14hbhvil_u:11994: puṣkalaṃ hanta-kāraṃ tu tac caturguṇam iṣyate // Hbhv_11.786 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11996: bhojanaṃ hanta-kāraṃ vā agryaṃ bhikṣām athāpi vā |
GR14hbhvil_u:11997: adattvā tu na bhoktavyaṃ yathā-vibhavam ātmanaḥ // Hbhv_11.787 //
GR14hbhvil_u:12001: dātuḥ śrāddha-phalaṃ nāsti bhoktā kilbiṣa-bhug bhavet // Hbhv_11.788 //
GR14hbhvil_u:12006: niṣṭhīvanaṃ ca śleṣmāṇaṃ gṛhād dūre vinikṣipet |
GR14hbhvil_u:12008: anuddhṛtya ca tat-kartur enasaḥ syāt turīya-bhāk // Hbhv_11.791 //
GR14hbhvil_u:12010: yas tu pāṇi-tale bhuṅkte yas tu phutkāra-saṃyutam |
GR14hbhvil_u:12011: prasṛtāṅgulibhir yas tu tasya go-māṃsavac ca tat // Hbhv_11.792 //
GR14hbhvil_u:12014: tayor dugdhaṃ na hotavyaṃ na pātavyaṃ kadācana // Hbhv_11.793 //
GR14hbhvil_u:12015: ajā gāvo mahiṣyaś ca yāmedhyam api bhakṣayet |
GR14hbhvil_u:12016: havye kavye ca tad-dugdhaṃ gomayaṃ ca vivarjayet // Hbhv_11.794 //
GR14hbhvil_u:12021: pratyakṣe api te grāhye niṣedhas tv anya-gocaraḥ // Hbhv_11.796 //
GR14hbhvil_u:12024: kārpāsaṃ danta-kāṣṭhaṃ ca śakrād api haret śriyam // Hbhv_11.797 //
GR14hbhvil_u:12026: kapilāyāḥ payaḥ pītvā śūdras tu narakaṃ vrajet |
GR14hbhvil_u:12027: homa-śeṣaṃ pibed vipro vipraḥ syād anyathā paśuḥ // Hbhv_11.798 //
GR14hbhvil_u:12029: yad atra likhitaṃ kiñcit tat kṣantavyaṃ mahātmabhiḥ // Hbhv_11.799 //
GR14hbhvil_u:12030: ācārāś cedṛśāḥ santi pare'pi bahulāḥ satām |
GR14hbhvil_u:12031: te loka-śāstrato jñeyā apekṣyā yadi vaiṣṇavaiḥ // Hbhv_11.800 //
GR14hbhvil_u:12032: nityatvam eṣāṃ māhātmyam apy atra likhitāt purā |
GR14hbhvil_u:12033: sad-ācārasya nityatvān māhātmyāc ca susidhyati // Hbhv_11.801 //
